Desc.entry: Goju-ryu, self-defence orientated Karate. Practices karate as it was originally intended, for self defence not sport or for use against trained opponents eg in an arena or military use. Incorporates blocks, kicks, punches, various strikes, take-downs, throwing techniques, disabling and restraining methods. Emphasis is on physical fitness, flexibility and self-defence. Regular courses are available with the chief instructor at venues throughout England and the local area. Annual Gasshuku (training camp) in various European countries with the world chief instructor. Is a member of International Okinawan Goju-Ryu Karate-Do Federation.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
